Translations.Text: Bahato heneratsiyi pered tym, yak yim, khto buv bilʹshe potuzhni, my vynyshchyly. Vony proanalizuvaly zemlyu; vony znayshly vtechu
Tse povynno buty urok dlya kozhnoho shcho volodiye rozumom, abo vmiye pochuty ta svidok
My utvoryly nebo ta zemlyu, ta vse mizh nymy u shesty dnyakh, ta niyaka vtoma ne torknulasya nas
Tomu, patsiyent pered yikhnimy vyslovamy, ta pokhvala ta glorify vash Lord pered skhodom sontsya, ta pered zakhodom sontsya
Pid chas nichni vy budete rozdumuvaty na Yoho nazvi, ta pislya toho yak prostrating
Pidhotovlyayutʹ dlya dnya koly caller vyklyky z mistsya shcho poblyzu
Koly vony chuyutʹ nemynuchyy krychatʹ; shcho yavlyaye soboyu denʹ vy vykhodyte
My yavlyayemo soboyu kotryy kontrolʹ zhyttya ta smertʹ; do nas yavlyaye soboyu zaklyuchnu dolyu
denʹ prybude koly zemlya trishchyny pospishayuchy, dayuchy spravlyayutʹsya z nymy. Takyy sklykayuchyy lehkyy dlya nas zrobyty
My znayemo tsilkom vse vony vymovlyayutʹ, v toy chas, yak vy ne mayete enerhetychnoho nad nymy. Tomu, nahaduyutʹ z tse Quran, tsya kotra povaha Moyi poperedzhennya
Shcho obitsyayetʹsya do vas bezsumnivno prybudete proyty
